snippet: Researchers hope the discovery of a new species of mouse lemur will bring more attention to the struggle to conserve the island's forests.
abstract: Researchers hope the discovery of a new species of mouse lemur will bring more attention to the struggle to conserve the island's forests.
lead_paragraph: Finding a new species may look easy on paper, the conservationist Jonah Ratsimbazafy says, but it takes a long, long time. He and his colleagues spent many a night in the jungle chasing after camouflaged hamster-size creatures hopping around the branches and brush. Their work paid off, though: after snagging 14 mouse lemurs, they were surprised to find they had a new species.
